attributes.action: MPs that defect to another party should trigger an immediate by-election
attributes.additional_details:
so that the electorate of the relevant constituency get a chance to be represented in parliament by an MP that represents them and the manifesto the majority initially voted for.
The votes should not follow the MP, as by definition of defection, the MP no longer represents the voters that put the MP in parliament, and the only way to check this is to have a by-election
attributes.background: Change the rules so that when a sitting MP defects to a different party, a by-election is immediately triggered

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

By-elections to be called automatically when MPs defect to another party
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/737660
